name: Welcome to the Show
summary:
Filming Locations: Santa Barbara, California, USA 
　　Plot Keywords: Surrealism | Absurd Humor | Minimalism 
　　Production Co: Bitter Films 
　　Sound Mix: Dolby SR 
　　Color: Color 
　　Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 
　　A "trilogy" of surreal and funny cartoons, produced exclusively to book-end the first year of The Animation Show's travelling theatrical tour.
info:
• 中文名: 幕间休息
  • 别名: Intermission in the Third Dimension / The End of the Show
  • 上映年度: 2003-07-18
  • 片长: 8min
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 导演: Don Hertzfeldt
  • 编剧: Don Hertzfeldt
  • 主演: Don Hertzfeldt / Robert May
